meanings.definition: Smoothed or leveled with a tool
meanings.sent1: He planed the rough wood to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter planed the surface of the table until it was flat.
meanings.sent3: After he planed the door, it felt as soft as a cloud.
meanings.sent4: She planed away the imperfections, revealing the beauty hidden beneath.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the planed wood was like a gentle whisper in the workshop.

meanings.sent1: They took a planed trip to visit their relatives.
meanings.sent2: The planed journey was quick and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The planed flight was so smooth, it felt like floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: She enjoyed the planed ride, watching the world below from above.
meanings.sent5: The planed passengers were excited to reach their destination in no time.

meanings.definition: Made a detailed proposal or arrangement for something
meanings.sent1: She planed out every detail of the event to ensure its success.
meanings.sent2: The team planed the project meticulously to avoid any mistakes.
meanings.sent3: He planed the surprise party, making sure everything was perfect.
meanings.sent4: They planed the schedule with precision, leaving no room for errors.
meanings.sent5: The students planed their presentation carefully, rehearsing multiple times.
